name: HP Inc.
rationale: Provides biometric ID systems for Israeli checkpoints that enforce apartheid. Supplies servers to Israeli military prisons holding Palestinian children.

name: Puma

sources.title: Puma Sponsors Israeli Football Teams in Illegal Settlements

name: SodaStream

sources.title: SodaStream's Factory in Illegal Israeli Settlement

rationale: Operated factory in Mishor Adumim settlement (built on stolen Palestinian land) until 2015. Still benefits from settlement economy.

name: Caterpillar Inc.

sources.title: Caterpillar Bulldozers Used to Demolish Palestinian Homes

rationale: Supplies D9 bulldozers to IDF, used to demolish 50,000+ Palestinian homes since 1967. Directly enables ethnic cleansing.

name: AXA

sources.title: AXA Invests in Israeli Banks Financing Settlements

rationale: Invests $100M+ in Israeli banks that fund illegal settlements. Profits from war crimes under ICC Statute Article 8(2)(b)(viii).

name: Sabra Hummus
rationale: Co-owned by Strauss Group, which provides food rations to IDF units committing genocide in Gaza. 50% profits fund occupation.

name: Booking.com

sources.title: Booking.com Lists Hotels in Illegal Settlements

rationale: Lists 200+ properties in illegal West Bank settlements, normalizing occupation. Violates UNHRC Resolution 31/36.

name: Elbit Systems
rationale: Israel's largest arms manufacturer. Supplies 85% of drones and land weapons used in Gaza massacres. Test weapons on Palestinian civilians.

name: Ahava

sources.title: Ahava Steals Dead Sea Resources from Occupied Land

rationale: Factory in illegal Mitzpe Shalem settlement. Steals Palestinian natural resources per Hague Regulations Article 55.

name: Volvo Group

rationale: Provides armored vehicles to IDF used in home demolitions and checkpoint violence. Complicit in crimes against humanity.

name: Expedia
